Future development¶

Future additions¶

  1. add status_modifier list of classes, to hold tidal stranding, kill old particles etc

  2. more post step bookkeeping to pre step bookkeeping to eliminate 2 costly update_cell

  3. Add velocity_modfier part prop used inside RK substeps which is updated by velocity_modfier classes every time step, eg terminal velocity

  4. find a number container suitable for passing all fields and part prop as a group by name, to allow assess to all and reduce arguments needed

  5. Fuse looping for field interpolation for particle properties to reduce RAM-CPU memory traffic

    • kernal version of interpolate fields

    • fuse velocity interpolation and euler step

    • Update field derived particle properties as a group with kernel interpolator

  6. make error trapping reponse more consistent

  7. Fuse Runge-kutta steps loops to reduce RAM-CPU memory traffic

    • kernal versions of BC walk and vertical walk

    • fuse BC walk and velocity interpolation using kernals

  8. Reader memory shared between parallel cases

  9. support for structured grids, eg. ROMS

  10. option for particle tracking to work natively in lat/log cords

  11. RK45 solver to allow adaptive time stepping to improve accuracy for those particles where flows are rapidly varying in time or space.

  12. Read release points/polygons from file, eg shape files, csv

  13. attach interpolator to reader, as step towards working with multiple readers/grids, eg waves on different grid to currents

Possible additions¶

  • merge numerical solver and random walk by moving to numerical solution as a stochastic ODE?

Minor features/fixes¶

  1. automatic particle buffer size estimate factor of 2 too large

  2. add class crumb trail method to be displayed in errors and warnings

  3. do full parameter set up and release group params and release times in main?

  4. use date class consistently through code, ie drop time in independent use of seconds, dates in netcdf files

  5. move fom looping over reader buffer to looping over global time step, as step towards shared reader

  6. reader buffer as ring buffer

  7. move kill old particles to a status modifier

  8. add update timer to all classes

  9. convert to new status modifier classes

    • cull particles

    • tidal stranding

    • kill old particles

  10. support short class_name’s given by user ie just AgeDecay,not oceantracker.particle_properties.age_decay.AgeDecay

  11. ensure all classes are updated by and .update() method

  12. stats/heat maps work from given data as in other plotting

  13. fields manager updated dry cell, move and/or generalize to cases where only tide and depth available

  14. velocities as float32 is significantly faster??

  15. move to looping over reader global time, remove passing nb, the buffer time step to methods

  16. see if numba @guvectorize with threading can increase overall speed on particle operations

  17. move velocity reading in al readers to own method to give more flexibility, make it a core particle property with write off by default

  18. ???
